divs: Sighting DetailsMy relative was heading home (driving) that evening about 9 p.m. from Roseville, CA heading south and noticed white lights rotating in the sky over Roseville that lasted for 10 minutes or so. Couldn't make out any shape of craft. There were probably 3 or 4 different lights. They just disappeared suddenly. My relative knew it was not a plane based on the odd movements of the lights.
Summary: Rotating lights in the sky over Roseville, CA
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Roseville
There were no other sightings in Roseville on or around December 16th 2010
